text: Anuwat Noicheunphan (, born September 21, 1988) is a Thai professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Thai League 1 club Chainat Hornbill and the Thailand national team. ==International career== In March, 2015 Anuwat debuted for Thailand in a friendly match against Singapore. ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
